name: Ornet
description:
Ornet takes on the theme of the space environment where a planet that wants to become the king of all planets and to realize its dream, the planet begins to devour other planets in order to become stronger and defeat the red planet, the king of all the present planets. Will the planet be successful? Help the planet now and become planet master!

As the player, you must get a green planet and avoid the red planet. Each orbit has different gravity, speed and direction of rotation. Focus is the key to winning this game.

Control :
  • Bottom left of the screen    :  move the planet to out of orbit.
  • Bottom right of the screen :  move the planet into orbit.
Credit :
  • Programmer : Nanda Febrian Adhinugroho
  • Designer & Art : Rifaldi Tajrial & Candani Kartiko P
Install Instruction :

Download the ornet.apk. Install it on your android device.
